allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add VS Code-style search panel and filename filter highlighting

- Add SearchPanel webview with VS Code-native styling and multi-scope search
- Add filename filter with tree highlighting \(yellow icons for matches\)
- Add excludePattern support to searchFiles for better filtering
- Add rich tooltips to search results with file metadata
- Add "Reveal in Tree" option for search results
- Add race condition fixes with mutex locks in FileService and ProgressiveDownloadManager
- Update LITE principles documentation \(server + UI/UX\)
- Add code quality and logging guidelines to workflow

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
